title: Simon Cowell girlfriend Lauren Silverman and ex Terri Seymour hang out
text:
Now this is what we call maturity (Picture: Snorlax / MEGA)

Most people would freak out at the thought of spending time alone with their ex’s new partner.

But most people aren’t Terri Seymour.

The reporter and model, who dated Simon Cowell from 2002 until 2008, spent some quality time with the mogul’s girlfriend Lauren Silverman at a pumpkin patch in Los Angeles.

Yes folks, it’s pumpkin patch season.

Lauren – who has been in a relationship with Si since 2013 – brought her and Cowell’s five-year-old son Eric along for the day, while Terri, 47, was accompanied by her three-year-old daughter Coco.

Eric and Coco joined their mums on the fun day out (Picture: Snorlax / MEGA)

Lauren and Simon have been together for six years (Picture: O\’Connor/AFF-USA.com / MEGA)

And despite their similar dating history, Lauren, 42, and Terri seemed to get on like a house on fire.

The pair were seen posing on pumpkins with their kids, with Eric dressed in a ‘Best Little Brother’ t-shirt – in reference to big bro Adam, 13, Lauren’s son from a previous relationship.

Then, Lauren, who was dressed in a bright yellow cardigan and jeans, and Terri, wearing a white tee and blue jeans, embraced their inner children as they jumped on a train in seats painted as bumblebees.

Lauren and Simon, 59, split their time between London and Los Angeles, and while Stateside, spend a lot of time with Terri, her boyfriend Clark Mallon and their daughter Coco.

Simon and Terri have remained close (Picture: Jason LaVeris/FilmMagic)

Back in August, the families enjoyed a dinner in the States, while Coco and Eric hung out together at the live final of America’s Got Talent.

Simon – currently a judge on The X Factor: Celebrity – has remained close to his exes over the years, including Jackie St Clair and Sinitta, who is even godmother to Eric.

The latter has famously helped out Simon at judges’ houses on The X Factor on numerous occasions, while Terri has also lent her assistance on the show.

However, Simon now only has eyes for Lauren, having been in a relationship with the US socialite for six years.

And the formerly notorious bachelor is loving life as a dad after his first child Eric was born in 2014.

Speaking on Lorraine, he said: ‘When you become a dad, something clicks in in you. it’s all about them.

‘You become very protective and importantly, part of the reason I changed everything in my life is, I see my life through his eyes now and it’s much more simple and it’s much more fun.’
